titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to make technical corrections in the continuation coverage requirements of group health plans.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 7/14/1988--Introduced. Amends title XXII (Requirements for Certain Group Health Plans for Certain State and Local Employees) of the Public Health Service Act to make specified changes with regard to: (1) continuation coverage exception rules; (2) the definition of the term "covered employee;" (3) reemployment or Medicare eligibility; and (4) applicable premiums.
